examples.example: 你是我心中的唯一，给我带来了无尽的欢乐和幸福。

translate.english: You are the only one in my heart and have brought me endless joy and happiness.

examples.example: 你是爸爸妈妈心目中的唯一，他们对你有着无限的爱与期望。

translate.english: You are the only one in the hearts of mom and dad, and they have unlimited love and expectations for you.

examples.example: 在我心里，你是我的唯一，我会永远珍惜我们之间的情谊。

translate.english: In my heart, you are my only one, and I will always cherish the friendship between us.
